hero.title: The Digital {seal} for the Modern Age
hero.subtitle: Add visible marks of authenticity to your documents, just like the royal seals of old.

loadDocument.title: Load Document
loadDocument.description: Load any PDF or image file you want to protect with a seal.

positionSeal.title: Position Your Seal
positionSeal.description: Place your unique seal exactly where you want it on the document.

sealIt.title: Seal it
sealIt.description: seal.codes creates a cryptographic seal that clearly proves your ownership.

dropzone.title: Drop your document here
dropzone.subtitle: or click to browse
dropzone.supportedFormats: Supported formats: PDF, PNG, JPG, JPEG
dropzone.error: Error processing document. Please try again.

upload.title: Upload Document
upload.description: Select the PDF or image file you want to seal.

position.title: Position QR Code
position.description: Choose where to place your authentication seal on the document.

authenticate.title: Authenticate
authenticate.description: Sign in with your social account to create the seal.

download.title: Download
download.description: Get your sealed document with embedded authentication.

socialProviders.title: Choose Authentication Provider
socialProviders.subtitle: Select how you want to authenticate your identity

sealed.title: Document Sealed Successfully
sealed.subtitle: Your document has been sealed with your digital signature

verification.title: Document Verification
verification.subtitle: Verify the authenticity and integrity of a sealed document

upload.title: Upload a Sealed Document
upload.description: Upload a document that contains an embedded QR code seal. We'll automatically scan the document, extract the attestation data, and allow you to verify the document's integrity.
upload.uploadToVerifyDescription: Now upload the document to verify that it matches the seal information shown above.
upload.qrDataFoundDescription: We found attestation data from the QR code link. This shows what the document should contain when verified.
upload.howItWorks: How it works: When you upload an image with an embedded QR code seal, we automatically scan and extract the verification data. You can then verify that the document hasn't been modified since it was sealed.
upload.privacy: All processing happens in your browser - your documents are never uploaded to our servers.
upload.invalidLinkDescription: The verification data in the URL is invalid.
upload.canStillUpload: You can still upload a sealed document above to scan for QR codes automatically.

seal.title: Digital Seal Information
seal.description: The QR code contains the following information about when and by whom this document was sealed.

document.title: Document Verification
document.selectQRHint: Click and drag to select QR code area
document.selectQRHintAlt: Or wait for automatic scanning to complete
document.manualSelectionTip: ðŸ’¡ Try clicking and dragging on the image above to manually select the QR code area.
document.uploadRequiredDescription: We have the seal information from the QR code. Please upload the document to verify that it matches this seal.

qr.foundMessage: QR code found and decoded successfully!
qr.notFound: No seal.codes QR code found in the image
qr.notFoundSelected: No QR code found in selected area

sidebar.title: How Verification Works

step1.title: Upload Document
step1.description: Upload the sealed document. We'll automatically scan for QR codes.

step2.title: QR Code Detection
step2.description: If automatic detection fails, click and drag on the image to manually select the QR code area.

step3.title: Hash Comparison
step3.description: We calculate the document's fingerprint (excluding the QR area) and compare it with the sealed version.

step4.title: Result
step4.description: Get confirmation whether the document matches the original sealed version.

sidebar.privacy: Privacy: Document verification happens entirely in your browser. Your files are never uploaded to our servers.
sidebar.manualSelection: Manual Selection: Click and drag on the image to select the QR code area if automatic detection fails.

errors.documentModified: Document has been modified since sealing

errors.fileTooBig: File is too large. Maximum size is 10MB.
errors.unsupportedFormat: Unsupported file format. Please use PDF, PNG, JPG, or JPEG.
errors.processingFailed: Document processing failed. Please try again.
errors.sealingFailed: Document sealing failed. Please try again.
errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
errors.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.subtitle: The page you're looking for doesn't exist.
